history.bold: S2PI is an industrial project initiated by Jean-Luc BELLI
history.text: who has over two decades of experience in the insulation manufacturing sector. S2PI is also a team of committed employees determined to deliver the best so clients can benefit from the quality of our products. S2PI continuously improves its products and internal processes to adapt to evolving demand, market trends, and regulations.

description.bold: S2PI is an innovative, human-scale company
description.text: that manufactures and distributes thermal, acoustic, and fire protection insulation made from slag wool. S2PI is committed to constantly improving its production processes. The client is at the heart of our focus. Every product is tailored to meet market needs and standards, undergoing rigorous quality control by accredited testing laboratories (EFECTIS, LNE). Our products are ACERMI certified and have Technical Assessments from CCFAT in the absence of DTU.

protection.title: PEOPLE PROTECTION & ENVIRONMENTAL CHALLENGES
protection.parallaxTitle: S2PI is continuously improving its production processes.

part1.bold: While fire safety in buildings requires a combination of actions
part1.text: like facilitating evacuation, installing alert systems, and smoke extraction equipment… passive protection remains the most effective. It is considered from the project's outset by integrating construction systems using non-combustible materials that do not contribute to starting or spreading fires. Passive fire protection also complements energy efficiency goals to help fight climate change. This strong belief has driven me for years and continues to guide my actions.

part2.bold: To meet environmental challenges and protect people and property, one must be truly committed and act with determination.
part2.text: This is the ambition I set when founding S2PI: to manufacture technical, economical, innovative, and reliable solutions based on shared expertise and experience.

content.quote: In the world of ideas everything depends on enthusiasm. In the real world all rests on perseverance.

itarn.title: ITARN - THERMAL INSULATION
itarn.subtitle: EXTERNAL APPLICATION
description: • A product made from slag mineral wool combined with a hydraulic binder.
• Designed for the thermal insulation of vertical external walls under ventilated cladding in residential, collective, or commercial buildings.
• Its acoustic and fire safety performance complements its thermal performance for optimal insulation.
• Sprayed pneumatically by qualified companies specializing in facades, masonry, and external insulation.

thermal.title: INSULATION SOLUTIONS
thermal.subtitle: THERMAL
description: Sprayed slag wool insulation, the solution for energy efficiency, fire safety, and building acoustics.

INNOSPRAY-FTH is designed for thermal insulation by spraying onto concrete slabs, beam-and-block floors, and composite steel-concrete floors. It reduces thermal bridging and avoids drilling into the slab. It is especially suitable for floor designs with embedded networks or pre-stressed slabs.

fire.title: FIRE PROTECTION SOLUTIONS
fire.subtitle: FIRE SAFETY
description: Fire protection coatings are sprayed coverings applied to expanded metal substrates, made from mineral wool and special binders, designed to protect floors from fire (not exposed to weather).
INNOSPRAY-FFM is a sprayed coating made from slag mineral wool and special binders, intended for the fire protection of steel structures not exposed to weather.

acoustic.title: ACOUSTIC SOLUTIONS
description: The ideal solution for horizontal insulation between dwellings and activity areas, or between homes and garages (private or collective).
S2PI solutions are suitable for both new and existing buildings in residential and non-residential sectors.
